turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order something from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, which store do you want me to order from.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Why don't we order from the one on Pike Street, that one's usually pretty good and not as busy as the one in Pike Place Market.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good. How many drinks will you be ordering?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just one drink for myself, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what is your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a cinnamon shortbread latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A grande, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good. And what kind of milk do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you ask them for soy milk, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes of course. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you also get me something to eat?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, is there anything in particular you're craving?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: If they have a blueberry muffin, that would be fantastic!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so I will get you one grande cinnamon shortbread latte with soy milk, and a blueberry muffin from Starbucks. Is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, the order has been placed. Would you like me to send you the receipt?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please send it to my phone.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Done, your order will be ready shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much!
